text: Elissa may refer to: * Elissa (name), a feminine given name (including people by that name) ==People== *Dido, Queen of Carthage in Greek and Roman mythology, also referred to as Elissa or Alyssa *Elissa (born 1972), Lebanese singer. ==Other uses == *Elissa (book), a 1900 novel by H. Rider Haggard *Elissa (ship), a historic sailing ship anchored in Galveston Bay *Elissa, one of the seven women occurring as narrators in Giovanni Boccaccio's The Decameron
title: Elissa
